Title: The Dark Knight Rises
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (story), David S. Goyer (story), Bob Kane (characters)
Actors: Christian Bale, Gary Oldman, Tom Hardy, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
Plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight must return to defend Gotham City against the enigmatic jewel thief Catwoman and the ruthless mercenary Bane as the city teeters on the brink of complete annihilation.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 34 wins & 68 nominations.
